• Teaching Assistant for ECEN 5863: Programmable Logic Embedded System Design
  • Assisted students with learning of theory related to programmable logic such as Clock Domain Crossings,FPGA architecture,Digital Logic,Verilog/VHDL etc.
  • Teaching Assistant for ECEN 5783: Embedded Interface Design
  • Graded students assignments,projects and quizzes.

• Fixed UI bugs relating to accessibility issues within the details page of a series or title
  • Developed a fully functional auto-playable trailer on the details page within the Prime Video Android Application

• Developed, deployed, and supervised full stack web and mobile applications to optimize processes internal and external to the company.
  • Created numerous web applications to manage sales workflows across mobile, internet and security lines of the business reducing the overall human effort.
  • Created multiple mobile applications to capture thousands of customer sales as well as to assist technicians during installations.
  • Developed a multi-faceted lottery system allowing customers to win prizes.
  • Built dozens of scripts and automations for tedious tasks within the company.
  • Automated the management of thousands of customer accounts using browser automations and reverse API engineering.
  • Led the re-engineering of multiple business processes within mobile, internet and smart home to reduce sale to installation time.
  • Oversaw projects and evaluations of summer interns from University of the West Indies.
